name: spo-copy-webparts-to-another-page
title: Copy Webparts From One Page To Another Page
shortDescription: This script sample shows how to copy webparts from one page to another page in the same site collection.
longDescription: This sample read Site Url, Source page and destination page from user and then we will copy webparts from source page to destination page

references.name: Want to learn more about PnP PowerShell and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the PnP PowerShell site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.
